languages.text: "Я бы назвал это более емким термином... но не хочу сквернословить в вашем присутствии".
"I would use a word with fewer letters to describe his act... but I do not wish to swear in your presence."
languages.original_text: "Я бы назвал это более емким термином... но не хочу сквернословить в вашем присутствии".

traits.locale_text: "I would use a word with fewer letters to describe his act... but I do not wish to swear in your presence."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I would use a word with fewer letters to describe his act... but I do not wish to swear in your presence."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I would use a word with fewer letters to describe his act... but I do not wish to swear in your presence."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I would use a word with fewer letters to describe his act... but I do not wish to swear in your presence."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: “我会用某个更加简短的词来形容他的行为……但我并不打算当着你的面说粗话。”
languages.original_text: "I would use a word with fewer letters to describe his act... but I do not wish to swear in your presence."

traits.locale_text: “我会用某个更加简短的词来形容他的行为……但我并不打算当着你的面说粗话。”
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: « Ce n'est pas le mot que j'aurais employé... mais je ne m'abaisserai pas à employer un langage aussi grossier en votre présence. »
languages.original_text: "I would use a word with fewer letters to describe his act... but I do not wish to swear in your presence."

traits.locale_text: « Ce n'est pas le mot que j'aurais employé... mais je ne m'abaisserai pas à employer un langage aussi grossier en votre présence. »
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "Ich würde ein Wort mit weniger Buchstaben als Beschreibung wählen ... doch ich möchte in Eurer Anwesenheit nicht fluchen."
languages.original_text: "I would use a word with fewer letters to describe his act... but I do not wish to swear in your presence."

traits.locale_text: "Ich würde ein Wort mit weniger Buchstaben als Beschreibung wählen ... doch ich möchte in Eurer Anwesenheit nicht fluchen."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: 「奴の行動の説明にはもっと端的な言葉を使いたいところだが…あなたの前で悪態はつきたくない」
languages.original_text: "I would use a word with fewer letters to describe his act... but I do not wish to swear in your presence."

traits.locale_text: 「奴の行動の説明にはもっと端的な言葉を使いたいところだが…あなたの前で悪態はつきたくない」
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: «Yo lo describiría con palabras más breves... pero prefiero no usar ese lenguaje en su presencia».
languages.original_text: "I would use a word with fewer letters to describe his act... but I do not wish to swear in your presence."

traits.locale_text: «Yo lo describiría con palabras más breves... pero prefiero no usar ese lenguaje en su presencia».
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.original_text: "I would use a word with fewer letters to describe his act... but I do not wish to swear in your presence."

languages.text: "Hareketlerini izah etmek için daha kısa ve öz bir sözüm var. Fakat huzurlarınızda küfür etmem hoş olmaz."
languages.original_text: "I would use a word with fewer letters to describe his act... but I do not wish to swear in your presence."

traits.locale_text: "Hareketlerini izah etmek için daha kısa ve öz bir sözüm var. Fakat huzurlarınızda küfür etmem hoş olmaz."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion
